text: The Fame is the debut studio album by American singer and songwriter Lady Gaga. It was released on August 19, 2008 by Interscope Records. It won the Grammy Award for Best Electronic/Dance Album in 2010. The single "Poker Face" won the Grammy for Best Dance Recording. Even though the album was released in 2008, it was listed at #31 on the Billboard 200 Decade-End album chart for the 2010s decade (2010â€“19). Billboard further ranked the album the 12th-best of all time and the 10th-best of the 21st century. ==Track listing== ==References== * Category:2008 albums Category:Lady Gaga albums Category:Debut albums Category:Dance-pop albums Category:Electronica albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Concept albums
title: The Fame
